q: broadcast media reports on Sunday, Brown asked police to investigate whether his phone had been hacked when he was prime minister between 2007 and 2010. Labour deputy leader Harriet Harman said police must investigate the allegations. Hacking into people's phones is illegal. Obviously the criminal law has got to be complied with and if it is broken then it should be investigated by the police and it should be enforced, she told Sky News. government outreach. Eric Schmidt also says he will act as an advisor to Page and co-founder Sergey Brin . "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt said on Thursday. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. No longer will the company be run by the "triumvirate" of Eric Schmidt as leader with Page and Sergey Brin as presidents. Eric Schmidt said Page, who was the company's founding CEO, is now ready

"As the CEO of a biotechnology company, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand 's initiative is extremely important to us," said Dr. Joan Fallon, Curemark founder and CEO. By supporting cutting edge research in the biotechnology field, and thus allowing for innovation, these R&D tax credits will help to defray the costs of basic research and clinical programs, which can be prohibitive to the small biotech companies. We at Curemark are extremely grateful for the Senator's leadership on this issue. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand 's proposal would expand the current credit by changing the formula to provide greater incentive for companies such as Curemark to increase investment; simplify the current credit, which is highly complicated and
